thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Kathy

author: Kathy
title: Kathy
text:
Love Thrift Books!!! I like to read, but don't want to go to the library, because of the time limitation and the renewing hassle..Also, they don't always have the authors I am looking for. Don't want to pay full price either. Came across Thrift Books, and the selection they have is endless.
The prices are great and the free shipping also.Books have always been in great condition also. Try it out you'll LOVE it.
